description: In this course we will go over ways in which you can adjust your spending habits to adhere to your specific lifestyle. How credit scores are calculated and what you can do to improve your score. The end goal is to instill a foundation of knowledge for students to use in order to alleviate all of the stresses of remaining financially sound. This information is strictly knowledge that typically only professionals are aware of and I am here to share it with you!
title: Everything You Should Know About Credit
